about_the_game:
This DLC contains 3 beautifully crafted models that we made for those interested in more mature content.

A modern French nurse costume:
Got some cuts and some bruises? Call the Nurse.

A housemaid costume:
Did all those monsters leave the Masters' mansion a mess? Call the maid.

A police officer costume:
Ready to protect and serve.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains 3 beautifully crafted models that we made for those interested in more mature content.

A modern French nurse costume:
Got some cuts and some bruises? Call the Nurse.

Did all those monsters leave the Masters' mansion a mess? Call the maid.

Ready to protect and serve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB Memory Minimum) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory Minimum)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent with 4GBs of VRAM

short_description: This DLC contains 3 beautifully crafted models that we made for all the people that are interested in more mature content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Hungarian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Romanian, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support
